title: Clean Up Day
author: Staff
excerpt: Help us keep the streets of downtown Doylestown clean and beautiful! Volunteers are needed to assist in the clean up of trash and litter. Trash bags will be provided for all who attend. Due to the ongoing pandemic social distancing and masking is still mandatory to participate. Please remember to bring your own gloves, we’ll […]
content:
Help us keep the streets of downtown Doylestown clean and beautiful! Volunteers are needed to assist in the clean up of trash and litter. Trash bags will be provided for all who attend. Due to the ongoing pandemic social distancing and masking is still mandatory to participate. Please remember to bring your own gloves, we’ll supply the trash bags!

  • Sunday, August 29, 2021
  • 9:00 AM  11:00 AM
  • Discover Doylestown
  • 63 East State Street in Doylestown, PA
